_STATUS: PHASE II SPECIFICATION — NOT EXERCISED IN EVIDENCE PACK v1
_PHASE_II_WARNING: This file describes a PLANNED wide slice configuration.
It has NOT been activated or executed in any Phase I experiments.
No 1000-cycle runs exist using these parameters.
All entropy targets and abstention projections are THEORETICAL.
Phase I Evidence Pack v1 uses:
- Dyno Chart runs are against existing PL slices, NOT wide slice
DO NOT cite this file as evidence of completed experiments.

_CRITICAL_fo_rfl_DISCLAIMER.warning: fo_rfl.jsonl (330 cycles) is NOT a Wide Slice run

_comment: Sample JSON output for curriculum_wide.yaml — Wide Slice Mode for RFL Uplift Experiments
_purpose: [PHASE II] Would produce non-trivial abstention (5-20%) and entropy for measuring RFL uplift across 1000-cycle runs

pl_wide.description: [PHASE II] Propositional logic wide slice curriculum for future Operation Dyno Chart

entropy_targets._warning: These entropy values are CALCULATED, not MEASURED from actual runs

parameter_rationale._warning: Rationale is design intent, not validated behavior
parameter_rationale.depth_max: Controls proof chain length and Lean verification time

gate_rationale._warning: These thresholds have NOT been calibrated against real wide-slice runs
gate_rationale.coverage_ci_lower_min: Relaxed vs production (0.75-0.88) to allow exploration
gate_rationale.backlog_max: Higher (0.42-0.55) to tolerate queue buildup during spikes

first_organism_compatibility._STATUS: HYPOTHETICAL — not tested with wide slice

first_organism_compatibility.adjustment_for_fo_fail: Set coverage_ci_lower_min to 0.92 to force coverage gate failure

_PHASE_II_UPLIFT_SLICES._STATUS: PHASE II DESIGN ONLY — NOT IMPLEMENTED, NOT EXERCISED, NO DATA EXISTS
_PHASE_II_UPLIFT_SLICES._PURPOSE: Curriculum slices designed for non-degenerate abstention where RFL uplift is measurable
_PREREQUISITES: run_fo_cycles.py configured for target slice parameters
Baseline + RFL comparison runs with sufficient cycle count (>=500)

slice_pl_uplift_a.name: slice_pl_uplift_a
slice_pl_uplift_a.description: Conservative entry point for Phase II uplift validation

expected_behavior.why_some_proofs_succeed: Depth 2-4 tautologies complete in <1s with 4 atoms
expected_behavior.why_nontrivial_abstention: Depth 5 + Lean overhead can timeout at 5s

slice_pl_uplift_b.name: slice_pl_uplift_b
slice_pl_uplift_b.description: Moderate challenge for primary uplift measurement

expected_behavior.why_nontrivial_abstention: 3s timeout is aggressive; depth 6-7 frequently timeout

recommended_run.success_criterion: Measurable coverage improvement with statistical significance

slice_pl_uplift_c.name: slice_pl_uplift_c
slice_pl_uplift_c.description: Stress test with maximum selection pressure

expected_behavior.why_some_proofs_succeed: Depth 4-6 formulas can complete in 2s if well-structured
expected_behavior.why_nontrivial_abstention: 2s timeout is very aggressive; depth 7-9 almost always timeout
expected_behavior.caution: If baseline abstention exceeds 70%, measurement becomes noisy

_selection_guide.slice_pl_uplift_a: Initial Phase II validation; confirm RFL machinery works

_recommended_sequence: 1. Run slice_pl_uplift_a baseline + RFL (500 cycles each)
2. If uplift detected, proceed to slice_pl_uplift_b (1000 cycles each)
3. If strong uplift confirmed, attempt slice_pl_uplift_c for stress validation

_implementation_notes.critical_flag: lean_enabled must be True (Phase I used False)
_implementation_notes.lean_project: Ensure backend/lean_proj/ is built and functional
_implementation_notes.timeout_enforcement: Verify Lean timeout is respected by worker process
_implementation_notes.metrics_capture: Must record per-formula success/fail/timeout for analysis

_u1_experiment_relationship._STATUS: U1 IS PREREGISTERED BUT NOT EXECUTED
_u1_experiment_relationship.difference_from_uplift_slices: U1 uses truth-table verification; uplift slices here use Lean-enabled
